title: Sorry Riot...
body:
I don't think i deservered for the free skin, because i hate oce player's. 
I got S1 demoted S5. Cuz season end and all Bronze + unranked join the ranked game and make my mmr bs.
I can't get out of this losing streak, cuz my whole team can't play defensive mode... Never watching any stream...
Like http://www.twitch.tv/pobelter/profile to learn more about this game... or froggen stream... and oce player's never learn....

replies.body:
>all Bronze + unranked join the ranked game and make my mmr bs.

That would boost your mmr, because you'd win more games. And that isn't exclusive to the OCE region. And it's not unranks joining as the season ends; that doesn't even make any sense. You are matched with people of your own skill.

And selling accounts will get you banned.

~~wtf $200 for a silver 5?~~

Anyway if somebody read this i selling this account 200$ 
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/744679
Silver 5.
